newsitem.title: USA: Zuckerman's Boston Properties mulls IPO - report.
newsitem.headline: Zuckerman's Boston Properties mulls IPO - report.

text.p: Mort Zuckerman plans to take his real estate company Boston Properties public in a deal that would raise $400 million or more, sources close to the deal have told BusinessWeek.
The real estate company currently holds 12 million square feet, mainly Class A office space with high occupancy rates in New York, Boston and Washington, the magazine said.
A spokesman for Boston Properties declined to confirm the report but said the company continually reviews its options.
